divs: Sighting DetailsI was at home sleeping and little green men came into my bedroom with flash lights that gave off heat. Ever since then they are continually in my dreams. I have also seen angels and many other thing at my house.After that night I have been going thru hell! IM pretty much having nightmares and after the incident all i thought was they were the good aliens. I only saw them with flash lights no objects.s at my house.
